name: --Remake SC1-- MISSIONS 1 to 6 of Terran Campaign
shortName: --Remake SC1-- MISSIONS 1 to 6 of Terran Campaign
description:
Remake SC1 : MISSIONS 1 to 6 of Terran Campaign

This is a remake of the sixth first missions of the Terran campaign from Starcraft 1.

The second and fourth missions were created by Tolkan, the four others by me.

Every dialogue and original features are included.

You will need the SC1 mod for the sixth mission, a mode created by Maverck.

We have worked mainly on the ambiance, the terrain, the music and cinematics.

We have added some stuff to try improve the fun of the original mission, like bonus objectives, some sounds here or there, and some difficulty...

So, you know how it works, put the mod in your" mod files" in your starcraft 2 "program files", not in "my document", and the map file in the "map files", then launch it.

So, enjoy, and please do not hesitate to tell me what you think about it!

Special thanks to Tolkfan, Maverck and Jones313.
author: _ForgeUser6333587
